entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who casts the spell 'Accio Horcrux'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard, who is accompanying Harry on this task.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: An object that contains a piece of Voldemort's soul, which is the target of their quest.

entities.name: the cave 525
entities.description: A location where Harry and Dumbledore are attempting to find the Horcrux.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to obtain the Horcrux, which is the target of their quest.
Dumbledore and Harry are at The Cave 525, where they are attempting to find the Horcrux.
Harry is accompanied by Dumbledore on this task.
